Reviews.Title: “Good enough”
Reviews.Author: no1me
Reviews.Content: hotel location ive alredy stayed twice view windows fori imperiali 3 minutes walking near minuts via del corso via vittorio emanuele clean breakfast poor hotel elevator consider value money

Reviews.Title: “Amazing location, friendly staff, clean rooms”
Reviews.Author: JMtl
Reviews.Content: stayed 1 night 3 adults triple walk hotel left walk 50 meters youll colosseum street location perfect people reception friendly helped whenever basic clean ive travelled lot recommend hotel

Reviews.Title: “The hotel Romano is great!”
Reviews.Author: Crego85
Reviews.Content: thoroughly enjoyed short stay hotel romano hope return sooner person met lovely gentleman santo reception welcoming spacious overlooked busy little street lots bars restaurants bathroom clean plenty soft white towels bit noisy pulled shutters afternoon siesta romano wonderful location beside forum colesseum walking distance rome morning token breakfast little café door fine slightly bigger breakfast heartily recommend romano wonderful value money thanks stay enjoyable

Reviews.Title: “Charmless and overpriced”
Reviews.Author: the4newmans
Reviews.Content: hotel central location otherwise dark hotel cheerless dark little worn edges staff friendly interaction hotel booking payment complicated prices charged poor value hotel

Reviews.Title: “Extremely poor value for money”
Reviews.Author: IrishPol
Reviews.Content: stayed 3 nights price hotel booked realise little money included breakfast indeed packet melba toast butter jam coffee fruit juice pastry snack bar door 5 mins consume werent offered tea coffee arrival wait cleaned 230pm wasnt facilities tea coffee wireless internet lounge bar resturant dine direction door tourist trap appears street outside recently ground bit rough touristy noisy hotel walking distance attraction rome especially collosseum forum bus vatican walk evening vatican day approx 40 min walk attraction 30 min walk clean housekeeping change towels throughout night stay staff helpful courtious towards future forking extra dough moving couple stars probably value accommodation rome look elsewhere booking hotel romano

Reviews.Title: “Decent hotel in a good location”
Reviews.Author: sunl0ver78
Reviews.Content: stayed albergo romano 4 nights honeymoon 710 min walk colloseum metro station literally road roman forum santo owner friendly spacious window facing busy street quiet window closed reasonably clean modern bathroom included continental breakfast cafe door consisted pack dry coffee juice muffin defintely worst breakfast trip france italy restaurants door ate times overall decent hotel fairly convenient value breakfast

HotelInfo.Name: Albergo Romano
HotelInfo.Address: Largo Corrado Ricci 32 | at Via Cavour, 00184 Rome, Italy
